title: #331: Cancel Culture With Tommy G and Mike Romanelli
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode I welcome the No Mercy's Tommy G and the Free Thinker's Society's Mike Romanelli to discuss the Cancel Culture we are living in right now. Thank you so much for all of your support.

Sam Tripoli's Live Shows:
Buffalo: (8/9-8/11): Helium Comedy Club
buffalo.heliumcomedy.com

Spokane: 8/17th: TFH with Eddie Bravo live at the Spokane Comedy Club at 10pm
www.spokanecomedyclub.com

Tacoma: 8/18th: TFH with Eddie Bravo live the Tacoma Comedy Club at 4:20pm
www.tacomacomedyclub.com

Check out Tommy G's No Mercy Podcast:
podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/no-m…st/id1411706853

twitter.com/tommyg
